qas.question: How old was Mary when she was consecrated as a virgin?
When she was betrothed to Joseph, approximately how old was Mary?
Where was Mary consecrated as a virgin?
How old was Anne when she gave birth to Mary?
How old was Hannah when Samuel took her to the Tabernacle?
Where did Saint Joachim and Saint Anne become betrothed?
Where was Saint Anne consecrated as a virgin?

context: According to the apocryphal Gospel of James, Mary was the daughter of <a0_0>Saint Joachim and Saint Anne<a0_0/>. Before Mary's conception, Anne had been barren and was far advanced in years. Mary was given to service as a consecrated virgin in <a4_0><b8_0><b9_0>the Temple in Jerusalem<b9_0/><b8_0/><a4_0/> when she was <a1_0><b6_0>three years old<b6_0/><a1_0/>, much like Hannah took <b7_0>Samuel<b7_0/> to the Tabernacle as recorded in the Old Testament. Some apocryphal accounts state that at the time of her betrothal to <a2_0>Joseph<a2_0/>, Mary was <a3_0><b5_0>12–14 years old<b5_0/><a3_0/>, and he was thirty years old, but such accounts are unreliable.
